name: Outlaw (itch) (Francesco Breglia, da-lu294, SarVivi)
description: A day like no other in the Old Wild West, people peacefully minding their business wanting to reach their destination by Locomotive, but the Wild West is a place full of surprises and nothing happens as you might expect or predict it.  A train robbery lead by no other than the wanted outlaw named Outlaw. Make a wrong decision and maybe the next bullet of lead is going to be in your body. What a chaotic world but a fun and interesting one for these Outlaws.
